How can I do it?

Minimize an application to System Tray in C#

How can I minimize an application to System Tray in C#?

June 26, 2010

Reading time ~1 minute

In this post we will see how we can minimize an application to System Tray in C#.

To minimize an application form to System Tray, we can use the NotifyIcon control in Visual Studio.

NotifyIcon is in the System.Windows.Forms namespace. Drag and drop a NotifyIcon control to your form.

To minimize the application to the system tray we need to handle the appropriate events. There are multiple events that can be used to achieve the outputâ€¦ The most appropriate will be the Form Resize event or the Form SizeChanged event.




I am using Form Resize event in the following snippet.

 1 private void Form1_Resize(object sender, EventArgs e)               
 2 {                
 3     if (FormWindowState.Minimized == this.WindowState)                
 4     {                
 5         notifyIcon1.BalloonTipTitle = "Minimize Sucessful";                
 6         notifyIcon1.BalloonTipText = "Sucessfully minimized app to the System Tray";                
 7         notifyIcon1.Visible = true; //Show the notifyIcon in the system tray                
 8         notifyIcon1.ShowBalloonTip(500); // Show the notification balloon                
 9         this.Hide(); //hide the form                
10     }                
11     else if (FormWindowState.Normal == this.WindowState)                
12     {                
13         notifyIcon1.Visible = false; //Hide the tray icon when the form is displayed                
14     }                
15 }
Tip

If you are not interested in the balloon tip, we can omit the BalloonTip and ShowBalloon lines.

So now we managed to minimize the application to the System Tray. To revive it back we need to write a couple more lines.
This time the event to be handled is NotifyIcon MouseDoubleClick or NotifyIcon MouseClick.

1 private void notifyIcon1_MouseDoubleClick(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)               
2 {                
3     this.Show();                
4     notifyIcon1.Visible = false;                
5 }
C# Minimize an application to System Tray in C# was published on June 26, 2010 (revised: November 09, 2014) Ebby Peter
